sentences.sContent: It is from the Bible that man has learned cruelty, rapine and murder; for the belief of a cruel God makes a cruel man.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is from the Bible that man has learned cruelty, rapine and murder; for the belief of a cruel God makes a cruel man.
sentences.sCn: 从基督教《圣经》人们学会了残忍、掠夺和谋杀，因对一个残忍的神的信仰造成了一个残忍的人。

trans.tranOther: the seizure of property by force; pillage
